#summary Joins VCF with a Wiggle file
Joins a sorted WIG[http://genome.ucsc.edu/FAQ/FAQformat.html#format6] file.

= Parameters =

  * *CHROM* : The CHROM column
  * *POS* : The POS column (first base is '1')
  * *Wig URI* : URI of the WIG[https://cgwb.nci.nih.gov/goldenPath/help/wiggle.html] (possibly gzipped or bgzipped); Eitheir fixed or variable intervals.
  * *Column-name* : New Column name
  * *Use step* : Use start+'wig.step' instead of start+'wig.span' to get the end of a genomic region.

= Input =


  * *In-Port 1* : Input


= Output =


  * *out* : Output
